product_name: REI Cozy Stripe Crew Socks - Women's - 2012 Seconds
long_description: The REI Cozy Stripe crew socks are soft and stretchy, and keep feet warm and comfortable. Microfiber nylon and polyester fleece are blended with spandex for ample stretch, durability and comfort. Flat toe seams keep REI Cozy Stripe crew socks smooth and nonirritating. Seconds; item has minor cosmetic imperfections that do not affect product performance.
short_description: The REI Cozy Stripe crew socks are soft and stretchy, and keep feet warm and comfortable.
